line_1: He wakes her Graces, who her empire guards,
line_2: For wisely Rome her warlike Sons rewards

line_1: I first attack'd a colonel of the guards —
LET the Vain Tyrant sit amidst his guards,
line_2: His puny GREEN-ROOM Wits and Venal Bards,

line_1: Well-pleas'd the Elfins smil'd, but she, who guards
